H0.text: Glaciers will advance is the best explanation of why global warming is such a concern, because global warming could change environmental conditions on Earth.

H1.text: The sea level will rise, which explains why global warming is such a concern, as the news often talks about how it could change environmental conditions on Earth.

H2.text: Earthquake activity will increase is the best explanation for why global warming is such a concern, given that the news frequently discusses how global warming could change environmental conditions on Earth.

H3.text: The overall temperature will decrease is why global warming is such a concern, as the news often talks about how global warming could change environmental conditions on Earth.

A4.text: These include ocean heating, ocean acidification and sea level rise.

A5.text: Amplified warming in the Arctic has contributed to thawing permafrost, retreat of glaciers and sea ice decline.
